name: insomnia-plugin-trace-headers
description: Generate cryptographically secure tracing headers and Snowflake IDs for various APM and observability systems including Tyk API Gateway

insomnia.name: trace-headers
insomnia.description: Generate cryptographically secure tracing headers and Snowflake IDs for OpenTelemetry, Datadog, AWS X-Ray, Azure, Jaeger, Zipkin, New Relic, Tyk API Gateway, Twitter, Discord, and many other observability systems.
